title: are the mods high or some shit
body: like if someone says a no-no word then poof the post dissapears. but if someone spams their cancer content on the wrong board it isnt removed????? like seriously if saying hey man u suck is remove-worthy (which has happened to me) then why isnt content that is 100% against the rules removed? im talking about plugging youtube videos/channels. that shit is for player creation, no? get this cancer off this board

replies.body:
If you don't want to see it, downvote it.
Simple.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k4rrqiAb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-14T01:26:42.420+0000)
>
> If you don't want to see it, downvote it.
> Simple.

thats not very effective. it should be remove as it breaches the rules. tbh this place is such a safespace that downvotes will probs get removed soon (see: NA boards)

Yup, OCE is such a safespace.

We've got Riot Marauder saying "%%%%%%" on community streams.
Outright harassment from SJWs.
JassonWazza.

So safe. Much space.

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k4rrqiAb,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-02-14T02:56:17.060+0000)
>
> Yup, OCE is such a safespace.
> 
> We've got Riot Marauder saying "%%%%%%" on community streams.
> Outright harassment from SJWs.
> JassonWazza.
> 
> So safe. Much space.

if anyone feels offended by any commnet you make, they can report you under being a jerk tbh. it covers anything with negative connotations. thats what i mean by safespace. also im glad that some people dont report that stuff and also that rioters arent at least tightasses. but we're only following NA example so time will tell

still, plugging your youtube channel or creation or anything that has its own board SHOULD be removed

The OCE Rioters are really lax.
Rioters elsewhere though...

> [{quoted}](name=Klavinmour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=k4rrqiAb,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-14T01:26:42.420+0000)
>
> If you don't want to see it, downvote it.
> Simple.

ah yes, the classic passive aggressive downvoting, a staple of boards use.
that doesn't work for people that view boards in the superior, non-circlejerk bump order.

and it's not about not seeing it, it's about the hypocrisy of the moderation.
